alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 9:00PM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING HAS BEEN REPLACED BY A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WHICH IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow, sleet, and freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills, Northern Oregon Cascades, Cascade Foothills in Lane County and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult due to snow and ice covered roads. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 15 to 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades
